outputs.output_descr: This project aims at institutional building of the Higher Council for Youth and the National Youth and Sports Fund through (a) initiate the preparation and adoption of a national strategy for youth and a Fund strategy encompassing the varied socio economic and recreational dimensions pertinent to all partners, (b) assisting in the review and amendments of legislation, which will strengthen the basis of an effective Higher Council for Youth and Youth Fund with the requisite process and responsibilities, (c) enable Youth Centers and the Fund to be attuned to present socio economic demands of youth, through a more focused and responsive structure with enhanced and proactive capabilities and programs, (d) bringing the concerned officials within the Higher Council for Youth to meet with their counterpart abroad to study and better understand working procedures in similar bodies, (e) establish a Unit at the Fund capable of providing advise on investment decisions (e) provision of needed international and national expertise, (e) enhancing information and experience sharing as well as networking.
outputs.output_title: Assistance of the HCY and YSF

project_descr: Assistance of the Higher Council for Youth and the Youth and Sports Fund in the Development of the Youth Sector in Jorda
project_title: Assistance of the HCY and YSF
